name: CulixCupric's Temeritus: Dark Scion
description:
Explore the world and delve dungeons, fight foes and bosses, steal spells, farm, fish, mine ores, open locks, take quests from the many factions and interesting characters, experience optional non-standard game overs, change form, turn back time, and more in this Adult Open World Immersive Sim RPG by CulixCupric.

Contains content for adult audiences only. (Turned on in options, or at the start of the game. Pick what you like, block what you don't.)

Play as Mara Alvah, last princess of Ubscura, having escaped to the present from the past during a siege on her home, and decide where to go from there. (The prologue is short, and skippable.)

8 major dungeons, and multiple side dungeons.
Increase Life, Magic, and Stamina at standing stones with experience gained from power crystals.
NPCs with randomized and adapting quests, as well as services such as healing and crafting.
Multiple conflicting factions. Join them, or use their conflicts to your advantage, attack them to ruin your reputation with them, or sneak by them as they fight.
Farming, fishing, mining, and cooking.
Time reversal: Go back in time with your character progress and inventory to undo all quest progress and reset faction reputations.
Non-standard defeat/game over scenes and transformations.
Play beyond game overs, switch factions, become a monster.
Uncover the lore of a post-industrial fantasy apocalypse.
